name: dfs.qjournal.get-journal-state.timeout.ms
description:
Timeout in milliseconds when calling getJournalState().
    JournalNodes.

name: fs.df.interval
description: Disk usage statistics refresh interval in msec.

name: mapreduce.shuffle.pathcache.max-weight
description: The maximum total weight of entries the cache may contain.

name: dfs.image.transfer-bootstrap-standby.bandwidthPerSec
description:
Maximum bandwidth used for transferring image to bootstrap standby
      namenode, in bytes per second.
      A default value of 0 indicates that throttling is disabled. This default
      value should be used in most cases, to ensure timely HA operations.
      The maximum bandwidth used for regular image transfers is configured
      with dfs.image.transfer.bandwidthPerSec.
      Support multiple size unit suffix(case insensitive), as described in
      dfs.blocksize.

name: dfs.datanode.fsdatasetasyncdisk.max.threads.per.volume
description:
The maximum number of threads per volume used to process async disk
    operations on the datanode. These threads consume I/O and CPU at the
    same time. This will affect normal data node operations.

name: mapreduce.task.io.sort.factor
description:
The number of streams to merge at once while sorting
  files.  This determines the number of open file handles.

name: httpfs.buffer.size
description: The size buffer to be used when creating or opening httpfs filesystem IO stream.
